description:
The http://anidb.net/ch95209 [Aihara Academy]`s Chairman is http://anidb.net/ch93138 [Aihara Shou]`s father and http://anidb.net/ch89974 [Mei]`s grandfather, who disliked http://anidb.net/ch89973 [Yuzu] at first due to her breaking his school`s rules and expelled her after walking in on Mei sexually assaulting Yuzu, assuming Yuzu was the one attacking. He later pardons her after she saves his life by calling him an ambulance after she finds him collapsed. Mei had taken chairman`s duties until he returned.
Source: Wikipedia
name: Rijichou
